summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1715, for the improvement of Thackery Place, from East 45th Street to 50th Street, East 50th Street, from Thackery Place to Latona Avenue, and Latona Avenue from East 50th Street to East 65th Street; all in the City of Seattle by constructing concrete sidewalks and wooden cross walks, with all necessary appurtenances for the proper drainage, under Ordinance No. 18181 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
